name: Ballaria Full Demo
description:
An adventure awaits! 

Travel through the lands, and uncover the end!

Since this is only a demo, there are only 16 levels. 

In the future, there should be about 5 worlds - the first tutorial world has 5 levels, then the next three worlds will have 11 levels, and the final world has 5 levels again (hardest one). 
Currently only the first 2 worlds are playable in the demo.

Each world will have its own mechanics.

Any feedback highly appreciated!
